import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Row, Col, Input, Select, InputNumber, DatePicker, AutoComplete, Cascader, Divider, Form, Button } from 'antd' const { Option } = Select; const initialState = { type:'收入/支出', category:'', amount:'', } const FormOpt = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, type: e.target.value }) console.log(formData) } return (
) } export default FormOpt
